impactDescription: Our contributions and projects on the OP Superchain have onboarded both artists and collectors alike into the ecosystem. Additionally, we started releases on ETH Mainnet originally and made a complete transition to OP Stack because we believe this is where creators will flourish. We have been a beacon for other artists switching off of Mainnet.
contributionDescription:
LNRZ was created by artists, for artists. We are a distribution vessel that gets great music heard, and great artists paid.

Over the past 7 months, we’ve been a leading curator of exciting onchain music drops, having partnered with 60+ artists and multiple companies, including OP Collective, Base, and Zora Network.

Our efforts have been successful in bringing visibility to emerging talent and their incredible music.

contributionLinks.description: First cross-chain music project on OP, Base, and Zora Network
LNRZ x Bonfire for Base Onchain Summer
Weekly curated drops with artists, music released on OP

impactMetrics.description: ETH raised on OP for Artists
